movies.title: Episode #1.8
movies.plot: The American Revolution pits Stitch and the American rebels against Mo and the British royalists, and teaches them that there are two sides - and often more - to every conflict.
movies.simplePlot: The American Revolution pits Stitch and the American rebels against Mo and the British royalists, and teaches them that there are two sides - and often more - to every conflict.

biography.bio: Mathew Baynton was born on November 18, 1980 in Essex, England. He is an actor and writer, known for Horrible Histories (2009), Tonight You're Mine (2011) and Hereafter (2010).
biography.name: Mathew Baynton

biography.bio: Simon Farnaby was born on April 2, 1973 in Darlington, County Durham, England. He is an actor and writer, known for Rogue One (2016), Your Highness (2011) and Bunny and the Bull (2009).
biography.name: Simon Farnaby

biography.bio: Sarah Hadland was born in 1971 in London, England. She is an actress, known for Quantum of Solace (2008), Magicians (2007) and Leap Year (2010). Sarah Hadland began her career in the performing arts at an early age, being trained in dance from the age of three. She was educated at Wimslow High School College and then later on at the Laine Theatre Arts College. She started her professional work with musicals in the West End and theatre before eventually moving on to a series of television roles. From then on, Sarah Hadland also acted in a few feature films, most notably alongside David Mitchell and Robert Webb in the films Confetti (2006) and Magicians (2007). She has also played the part of Queen Victoria in a _Horrible Histories_ episode. Sarah Hadland has notably provided the voice for Ceila Reidley in the English dub of Professor Layton and the Eternal Diva (2009).
biography.name: Sarah Hadland

biography.bio: Martha Howe-Douglas was born in 1980 in Birmingham, West Midlands, England. She is an actress and writer, known for Doctors (2000), Horrible Histories (2009) and Bill (2015).
biography.name: Martha Howe-Douglas

biography.bio: Jim Howick was born on May 14, 1979 in Chichester, Sussex, England. He is an actor and writer, known for Hellboy (2004), Horrible Histories (2009) and Bill (2015).
biography.name: Jim Howick

biography.bio: Laurence Rickard is a writer and actor, known for Horrible Histories (2009), Yonderland (2013) and Bill (2015).
biography.name: Laurence Rickard

biography.bio: Ben Willbond was born in 1973 in Buckinghamshire, England. He is an actor and writer, known for Bridget Jones Baby (2016), Your Highness (2011) and Acoustic Kitty (2014).
biography.name: Ben Willbond

biography.bio: Lisa Devlin is an actress, known for Bane (2008), Horrible Histories (2009) and Ninja Man (2002).
biography.name: Lisa Devlin

biography.bio: Jon Culshaw was born on June 2, 1968 in Ormskirk, Lancashire, England as Jonathan Peter Culshaw. He is an actor and writer, known for Top 50 'Most Haunted' Moments (2005), Top Ten 'Most Haunted' Possessions (2006) and Best Ever Spitting Image (2006).
biography.name: Jon Culshaw

biography.bio: Susie Donkin is an actress and writer, known for Horrible Histories (2009), Smack the Pony (1999) and Bill (2015).
biography.name: Susie Donkin

biography.bio: Jess Robinson is an actress, known for Pinky and Perky Show (2008), The Book of Unwritten Tales 2 (2015) and The Book of Unwritten Tales (2011).
biography.name: Jess Robinson

biography.bio: Lawrence Stevenson is an actor, known for Coriolanus (2011), Christmas Eve (2015) and London Kills Me (1991).
biography.name: Lawrence Stevenson
